dict.string: $(DEVELOPMENT_LANGUAGE)
ERPForever
$(EXECUTABLE_NAME)
com.mujeer.erpforever
zoho_clone
APPL
$(FLUTTER_BUILD_NAME)
$(FLUTTER_BUILD_NUMBER)
ERPForever needs Bluetooth access to connect to business devices such as barcode scanners, printers, and other peripheral devices.
ERPForever needs Bluetooth access to communicate with business peripherals and devices for enhanced ERP functionality.
ERPForever needs calendar access to schedule meetings, track appointments, and manage business events within your ERP workflow.
ERPForever needs camera access to scan barcodes, QR codes, and capture business documents. This helps you quickly input data and manage inventory.
ERPForever needs access to your contacts to help you quickly select and manage business contacts, import customer information, and streamline communication workflows in your ERP system.
ERPForever needs access to documents to import and export business files, reports, and data for your ERP operations.
ERPForever uses Face ID to provide secure and convenient access to your business data and sensitive ERP information.
ERPForever needs access to your local network to connect to local servers, printers, and other business devices on your network.
ERPForever needs location access to provide comprehensive location-based business services including background location tracking for work hours and automated location-based check-ins.
ERPForever needs location access to provide location-based features such as tracking work locations, finding nearby offices, and location-based time tracking for business operations.
ERPForever may need microphone access for voice notes, audio recording of meetings, and voice-to-text features to enhance your business productivity.
ERPForever needs motion access to track work-related activities and provide insights into your business productivity patterns.
ERPForever needs permission to save screenshots, business documents, reports, and images to your photo library for easy access and sharing of important business information.
ERPForever needs access to your photo library to save and manage business documents, screenshots, reports, and images. This allows you to organize and share important business information.
ERPForever needs access to reminders to help you manage tasks, deadlines, and business reminders integrated with your ERP system.
ERPForever needs speech recognition access to provide voice-to-text features for faster data entry and voice commands in your business workflow.
ERPForever would like to track your activity across other companies' apps and websites to provide better analytics and improve your business experience.
